name: @vibepilot/agent
description: VibePilot backend agent with PTY sessions, WebSocket server, and WebRTC support
author: Your Name

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');try{const pty=p.dirname(p.dirname(require.resolve('node-pty')));const h=p.join(pty,'prebuilds',process.platform+'-'+process.arch,'spawn-helper');if(fs.existsSync(h)){fs.chmodSync(h,0o755);console.log('[node-pty] Fixed spawn-helper permissions:',h)}else{console.warn('[node-pty] spawn-helper not found:',h)}}catch(e){console.warn('[node-pty] Failed to fix permissions:',e.message)}"
